column3: ACK. ping @theuni one for the trivial tree\n

ACK. Pulled into trivial-next, so you can close this. In the short-term future for pulls like this, please PR them directly to the trivial-next branch in https://github.com/theuni/bitcoin . These will be merged into mainline bitcoin every few weeks.\n\nThis has been setup to reduce the PR load on the main bitcoin repo. If this goes well, a bitcoin-trivial tree will likely be setup under the bitcoi

> Pulled into trivial-next, so you can close this. In the short-term future for pulls like this, please PR them directly to the trivial-next branch in https://github.com/theuni/bitcoin .

Understood and thanks. My apologies for being ignorant of that avenue before now.
No worries at all, there was no way to know. We've just started this as a trial, and I'm just making it up as I go along. Once some sort of system emerges, it'll be documented for sure.\n
